database.name: VIEW SSVE_VIATICAL_DETAILS_AUX2
database.view: SELECT ssve_viatical_details_aux1.ssve_viatical_id, sum(ssve_viatical_details_aux1.totalamt_viatical) AS totalamt_viatical, ssve_viatical_details_aux1.sfb_budget_cert_line_id FROM ssve_viatical_details_aux1 GROUP BY ssve_viatical_details_aux1.ssve_viatical_id, ssve_viatical_details_aux1.sfb_budget_cert_line_id
